results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 01c408e947084d56a7c17ef8ac15437a. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 0d721e1b59eb428c83869e7b3e8bf82a:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests

results.prompt_sent: Mark task cd37ad381a524447bb9d80940a2ef2df as currently in progress.
Find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details including all tasks.
model_responses: I apologize, it seems I made a mistake in assuming the workunit ID. Could you please provide the exact ID of the "Fix Login Page Bug" workunit? Once I have that, I can retrieve its details and tasks.

arguments.title: Password validation fix location
